Html:
Hi Roman,

I'm almost done with FastColoredTextBox integration (work item).
Here is a screenshot of the current version:

It's a lot faster than RichTextBox and works quite stable.
Notice brace matching: brace symbols are taken from LanguageData — Grammar.RegisterBracePair(…).

Added a new feature: wavy-line highlighting for error tokens:

I'm just pushed these changes to my fork: http://irony.codeplex.com/SourceControl/network/forks/yallie/IronyContrib

Please let me know if you find any problems.

Regards, yallie.

everybody who's following - please disregard my last message, mistakenly replied to notification message, so it got broadcasted

my deep apologies

Roman
